channel.title: Loot drop table?
channel.description:
Can someone help me understand this drop table or help me get my loots back to config.java other than data/cfg/json/drops this is really annoying but useful for coins.
rolls: 2 = not sure. npcIdentifiers = npc id Static drops are suppose to be i guess always. Dynamic drops are raritys itemId = the item id hitRollCeil = the chance of getting the item? not sure (if so what numbers are the better chance at getting the loot between 1 - 1000) maxAmount = how many of the item dropped minAmount = same thing as maxAmount
[code]{ "rolls": 2, "npcIdentifiers": [ 6611 ], "staticDrops": [ { "itemID": 532, "hitRollCeil": 1.0, "maxAmount": 1, "minAmount": 1 } ], "dynamicDrops": [ { "itemID": 12601, "hitRollCeil": 300.00, "maxAmount": 1, "minAmount": 1 },[/code]

item.title: Loot drop table?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I’m sure if you look at the code you could figure out what it’s doing, but you seem to be along the right tracks for each one.

The minAmount is the minimum amount is would drop I’m assuming and the maxAmount is the maximum, so it would be in the range of min-max.

The rolls I’m guessing how many times it will try to get a drop for the player? So there may be a possibility of hitting the rare table twice.

Read full topic

item.title: Loot drop table?
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Can someone help me understand this drop table or help me get my loots back to config.java other than data/cfg/json/drops this is really annoying but useful for coins.

rolls: 2 = not sure.
npcIdentifiers = npc id
Static drops are suppose to be i guess always.
Dynamic drops are raritys
itemId = the item id
hitRollCeil = the chance of getting the item? not sure (if so what numbers are the better chance at getting the loot between 1 - 1000)
maxAmount = how many of the item dropped
minAmount = same thing as maxAmount

{ "rolls": 2, "npcIdentifiers": [ 6611 ], "staticDrops": [ { "itemID": 532, "hitRollCeil": 1.0, "maxAmount": 1, "minAmount": 1 } ], "dynamicDrops": [ { "itemID": 12601, "hitRollCeil": 300.00, "maxAmount": 1, "minAmount": 1 },

Read full topic
